question.title: Type Conversion
question.content:
Given a double value d, typecast it to an integer value and print it.

Example:

Input: d = 10.23
Output: 10
Explanation: The integer value of 10.23 is 10

rephrased.body: Write a program that takes a double value as input and converts it to an integer by truncating the decimal part. Print the resulting integer.

testcases.explanation: The double value 10.23, when converted to an integer, becomes 10 as the decimal part is discarded.
The double value 5.99, when converted to an integer, becomes 5.
The double value -3.14, when converted to an integer, becomes -3.
The double value 0.0, when converted to an integer, becomes 0.
